Package com.maingame.game.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DemoPlayState
    This class handles the playstate for the Demo version of the game - no input, and the player boat moves by itself.
    DemoState
    Automates the PlayState, in the demo mode.
    GameOverHealth
    Shows a Game Over Screen for users who have hit too many obstacles and reached 0 health.
    GameOverSpeed
    Shows a Game Over Screen for users who were too slow and lost the three legs.
    GameStateManager
    Manages which state is shown to the user and transition between states using a stack.
    LeaderboardState
    Shows a leaderboard with the boats ranked according to how much time they took.
    LoadState  
    MenuState
    Shows a menu where users can select different coloured boats and see their different stats.
    PauseState
    This is the screen displayed to the user when they have pause the game.
    PlayState
    Handles the logic of the main game and loading of assets.
    SaveInfo
    A class to encapsulate the necessary information to save the playstate to file.
    SaveState  
    State  
    WelcomeState
    Shows a Welcome Screen for users.
    WinState
    This is the screen displayed to the user when they have won the game.
